name: Cursing Wizard
description:
The is a prototype of a top down wizard cursing game.

Your job is to run into a town and curse all the villagers and make sure they all escape. 

Current Features:

  1. Movement
  2. Shooting curses
  3. NPC villagers to chase down

Future Features:

  1. NPC's that will attack you
  2. NPC's that will remove curses from villagers
  3. Upgrades to your wizard
  4. Lighting
  5. Much much more
